developers.title: Developers
developers.subtitle: Meet the team behind the project
developers.howItStartedText: Aura+ was born from observing a real problem in companies: the difficulty in keeping employees engaged and connected with organizational culture. We noticed that managers often lack visibility into their teams' emotional climate, and employees don't have a simple channel to express how they're feeling.
developers.ourMissionText: We want to create an environment where every employee feels valued and heard. We believe that peer recognition and emotional transparency are fundamental to building more united and productive teams. Aura+ is our contribution to making the workplace more human and welcoming.
developers.techInnovationText: We developed this project as part of FIAP's Global Solution 2025-2, applying best practices in mobile development with React Native and Expo. Our architecture was designed to be scalable, modern, and provide the best possible experience to users.
